ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(Start_Date__c), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Category__c, "Internal Allocation")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Category__c, "Unofficial Subproject")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Category__c, "Series LLC")), OR( ISPICKVAL(Project_Status__c, "Active"), ISPICKVAL(Project_Status__c, "Archived") ) )
